item.title: Read for EARLY Access: MongoDB’s AI Applications Program(MAAP)
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction MongoDB announced MAAP – MongoDB AI Applications Program, designed to help organizations rapidly build and deploy applications enriched with generative AI technology. MongoDB’s AI Applications Program represents a significant initiative within the AI industry. It aims to assist companies in effectively integrating generative AI into their applications. The program emerged when major players like […]
item.content:encoded:
Introduction MongoDB announced MAAP – MongoDB AI Applications Program, designed to help organizations rapidly build and deploy applications enriched with generative AI technology. MongoDB’s AI Applications Program represents a significant initiative within the AI industry. It aims to assist companies in effectively integrating generative AI into their applications. The program emerged when major players like […]

The post Read for EARLY Access: MongoDB’s AI Applications Program(MAAP) appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.
